dataLink.name: Hadley Centre Sea Ice and Sea Surface Temperature data set (HadISST)

availability.description: The Met Office Hadley Centre's sea ice and sea surface temperature (SST) data set, HadISST1, replaces the Global sea Ice and Sea Surface Temperature (GISST) data sets, and is a unique combination of monthly globally-complete fields of SST and sea ice concentration on a 1 degree latitude-longitude grid from 1870 to date.
availability.name: Hadley Centre Sea Ice and Sea Surface Temperature data set (HadISST)

description: Impose HadISST sea ice and sea surface temperature data.
name: HadISST
rationale: To provide sea surface temperature boundary conditions for the AMIP experiments.
longName: Hadley Centre Sea Ice and Sea Surface Temperature data set
keywords: HadISST, Sea surface temperature, Sea ice, SST, SIC prescribed
